title: 理解和预测基因剪接的新方法
description: 由生物系研究人员开发的KATMAP模型能够预测选择性细胞剪接，这种机制使得细胞能够从相同的基因蓝图中创造出无限的多样性。
titleZh: 理解和预测基因剪接的新方法
titleEn: New approach to understanding and predicting gene splicing
descriptionZh: 由生物系研究人员开发的KATMAP模型能够预测选择性细胞剪接，这种机制使得细胞能够从相同的基因蓝图中创造出无限的多样性。
descriptionEn: The KATMAP model, developed by researchers in the Department of Biology, predicts alternative cellular splicing, a mechanism that allows cells to create unlimited diversity from the same genetic blueprint.

descriptionEn: OpenAI alone has signed $588 billion in computing contracts for 2025, making it an undisputed mega-client in the eyes of major US cloud providers.

title: AI女歌手征服美国排行榜，格莱美天后惨遭摧残：人类歌声被贬值
description: 最近，AI 歌手 Xania Monet 凭借一首病毒单曲登上了 Billboard 电台排行榜，成为第一位进入该排行榜的 AI 艺术家，并获得了 300 万美元的唱片合约。
titleZh: AI女歌手征服美国排行榜，格莱美天后惨遭摧残：人类歌声被贬值
titleEn: AI Female Singer Conquers US Charts, Grammy Diva Devastated: Human Vocals Are Devalued
descriptionZh: 最近，AI 歌手 Xania Monet 凭借一首病毒单曲登上了 Billboard 电台排行榜，成为第一位进入该排行榜的 AI 艺术家，并获得了 300 万美元的唱片合约。
descriptionEn: Recently, AI singer Xania Monet reached the Billboard radio chart with a viral single, becoming the first AI artist to enter the chart and securing a $3 million record deal. Monet's explosive popularity has caused an uproar in the music industry, with Grammy-winning diva SZA criticizing it as "devaluing music."

title: 硅谷“甄嬛传”大戏愈演愈烈：马斯克分享，伊利亚出手——当晚谁刺伤了奥特曼？
description: 硅谷的《甄嬛传》的史诗冲突比美剧还要激烈，阴谋、背叛、曲折展开，充满了乔布斯式的“现实扭曲场”。
titleZh: 硅谷“甄嬛传”大戏愈演愈烈：马斯克分享，伊利亚出手——当晚谁刺伤了奥特曼？
titleEn: Silicon Valley's "Empresses in the Palace" Drama Intensifies: Musk Shares, Ilya Takes Action—Who Stabbed Altman That Night?
descriptionZh: 硅谷的《甄嬛传》的史诗冲突比美剧还要激烈，阴谋、背叛、曲折展开，充满了乔布斯式的“现实扭曲场”。
descriptionEn: Silicon Valley's "Empresses in the Palace" features epic clashes more intense than American TV shows—conspiracies, betrayals, and plot twists unfold, complete with a Jobs-esque "reality distortion field." Idealist Ilya confronts ambitious Altman; once united in saving humanity, they now battle fiercely. Ilya defends his beliefs, Altman fights for reality, while Musk fans the flames from the sidelines.
